lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What promise did God make to old Simeon?
answers: He would see the Christ before he died
He would become a great teacher
He would live to be very old

questions.text: What did Simeon say about Jesus' future?
answers: A sword would pierce Mary's heart, he'd make people rise and fall
He would become king of Rome
He would defeat the mighty Roman army

questions.text: Why did Jesus' family travel to Jerusalem?
How old was Jesus in this story?
When his family left for home, what did Jesus do?
After three days, where did his parents find Jesus?
answers: At the temple listening to teachers

questions.text: What did the temple teachers think about Jesus' questions and answers?
When his mother Mary was upset, what did Jesus say?
answers: Didn't you know I needed to be in my Father's house?
I wanted to stay with my friends
You should pay more attention to me
I didn't hear you calling me

questions.text: What does Luke say about Jesus when he went home?
answers: He grew in wisdom, size, and relationships
He got into a lot of trouble
He kept getting left behind on accident
